column4: This is a pretty bad error; I'm cut-off now; I put a trader auth key onto that PC and the software... argh. Any ideas on quick-fixes, that would increase the chance I manage to boot with network working?
Why is it that linux has so little errors, but the ones that happen are almost close to fatal :(
Also, assumes the user knows what he/she is doing.  And a good percent of the time, I don't.
